QuestData.Title: The Wildkin's Oath
QuestData.Description: Wildkin with Elune. Aroom in your debt now.$B$BAroom help you now. Return to Malfurion, I join you soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Malfurion Stormrage at the Eye of the Vortex.
QuestData.RewardText: The wildkin were once the guardians of the land. It is good to hear they haven't all forgotten their old ways.
